Sequence Information.Peptide Name: MrCrs (M. rosenbergii crustin, lipopeptides; UCSS1a; 6S=S, natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXP; XXL)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Able to agglutinate G+ and G- bacteria and inhibit bacterial growth (bacteria-agglutinating). MrCrs peptide sequence contains a long WAP (whey acidic protein) domain, ~50% Similar toAP1555. In addition, MrCrs peptide sequence contains six N-myristoylation sites and two protein kinase C phosphorylation sites (read the article).
Literature Information.Author: Arockiaraj J, Gnanam AJ, Muthukrishnan D, Gudimella R, Milton J, Singh A, Muthupandian S, Kasi M, Bhassu S.2013
Literature Information.Title: Crustin, a WAP domain containing antimicrobial peptide from freshwater prawn Macrobrachium rosenbergii: Immune characterization
